languages.text: {n}Тело слишком истерзано и измучено, чтобы подчиняться разуму... возможно, так было бы для кого-то другого. Но не для вас. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Вы проходили и через худшее{/d}. Мучениям и пыткам больше вас не сломать. Осталось только понять, во имя чего вы подниметесь на ноги и пойдете вперед.{/n}

{n}Your body has suffered too much to obey your mind... or rather, that is how it would have been for someone else, perhaps. But not for you. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}You have lived through worse{/d}. Anguish and torture could never break you now. You will rise to your feet and press on. All that is left to understand is why you should.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тело слишком истерзано и измучено, чтобы подчиняться разуму... возможно, так было бы для кого-то другого. Но не для вас. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Вы проходили и через худшее{/d}. Мучениям и пыткам больше вас не сломать. Осталось только понять, во имя чего вы подниметесь на ноги и пойдете вперед.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your body has suffered too much to obey your mind... or rather, that is how it would have been for someone else, perhaps. But not for you. You have lived through worse. Anguish and torture could never break you now. You will rise to your feet and press on. All that is left to understand is why you should.{/n}

{n}Your body has suffered too much to obey your mind... or rather, that is how it would have been for someone else, perhaps. But not for you. You have lived through worse. Anguish and torture could never break you now. You will rise to your feet and press on. All that is left to understand is why you should.{/n}

{n}Your body has suffered too much to obey your mind... or rather, that is how it would have been for someone else, perhaps. But not for you. You have lived through worse. Anguish and torture could never break you now. You will rise to your feet and press on. All that is left to understand is why you should.{/n}

{n}Your body has suffered too much to obey your mind... or rather, that is how it would have been for someone else, perhaps. But not for you. You have lived through worse. Anguish and torture could never break you now. You will rise to your feet and press on. All that is left to understand is why you should.{/n}

{n}Your body has suffered too much to obey your mind... or rather, that is how it would have been for someone else, perhaps. But not for you. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}You have lived through worse{/d}. Anguish and torture could never break you now. You will rise to your feet and press on. All that is left to understand is why you should.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的肉体经历了太多痛苦，根本无法服从你的意志……更确切地说，如果换做是别人，确实可能再也站不起来了，但对你而言并非如此。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}你经历过更可怕的恐怖{/d}，痛苦与折磨已经无法再将你击垮。你靠着意志，站了起来，继续前进。唯一要做的事情，就是想清楚究竟为什么要这么做。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your body has suffered too much to obey your mind... or rather, that is how it would have been for someone else, perhaps. But not for you. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}You have lived through worse{/d}. Anguish and torture could never break you now. You will rise to your feet and press on. All that is left to understand is why you should.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的肉体经历了太多痛苦，根本无法服从你的意志……更确切地说，如果换做是别人，确实可能再也站不起来了，但对你而言并非如此。你经历过更可怕的经历，痛苦与折磨已经无法再将你击垮。你靠着意志，站了起来，继续前进。唯一要做的事情，就是想清楚究竟为什么要这么做。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein Körper hat zu viel erlitten, um deinem Verstand zu gehorchen ... Oder besser gesagt, so wäre es bei anderen vielleicht gewesen. Aber nicht bei dir. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Du hast schon Schlimmeres überlebt{/d}. Folter und Pein könnten dich niemals brechen. Du wirst aufstehen und weitergehen. Du musst nur noch verstehen, warum du das tun solltest.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your body has suffered too much to obey your mind... or rather, that is how it would have been for someone else, perhaps. But not for you. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}You have lived through worse{/d}. Anguish and torture could never break you now. You will rise to your feet and press on. All that is left to understand is why you should.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein Körper hat zu viel erlitten, um deinem Verstand zu gehorchen ... Oder besser gesagt, so wäre es bei anderen vielleicht gewesen. Aber nicht bei dir. Du hast schon Schlimmeres überlebt. Folter und Pein könnten dich niemals brechen. Du wirst aufstehen und weitergehen. Du musst nur noch verstehen, warum du das tun solltest.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre corps a bien trop souffert pour obéir à votre esprit... Du moins, ce serait le lot du commun des mortels, mais pas le vôtre. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Vous avez survécu à pire{/d}. L'angoisse et la torture n'ont plus aucune emprise sur vous. Vous allez vous relever et reprendre votre route. Tout ce qu'il vous reste à trouver, c'est une bonne raison de le faire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your body has suffered too much to obey your mind... or rather, that is how it would have been for someone else, perhaps. But not for you. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}You have lived through worse{/d}. Anguish and torture could never break you now. You will rise to your feet and press on. All that is left to understand is why you should.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre corps a bien trop souffert pour obéir à votre esprit... Du moins, ce serait le lot du commun des mortels, mais pas le vôtre. Vous avez survécu à pire. L'angoisse et la torture n'ont plus aucune emprise sur vous. Vous allez vous relever et reprendre votre route. Tout ce qu'il vous reste à trouver, c'est une bonne raison de le faire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu cuerpo ha sufrido demasiado como para obedecerte... es lo que diría cualquier otro. Pero tú no. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Las has pasado peores{/d}. La tortura y la angustia no pueden quebrantarte. Te levantarás y seguirás. Solo te falta comprender por qué debes hacerlo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your body has suffered too much to obey your mind... or rather, that is how it would have been for someone else, perhaps. But not for you. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}You have lived through worse{/d}. Anguish and torture could never break you now. You will rise to your feet and press on. All that is left to understand is why you should.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu cuerpo ha sufrido demasiado como para obedecerte... es lo que diría cualquier otro. Pero tú no. Las has pasado peores. La tortura y la angustia no pueden quebrantarte. Te levantarás y seguirás. Solo te falta comprender por qué debes hacerlo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの体は、あなたの心に従えないほどの苦しみの中にある…というより、他の誰かにとってはそういった状態なのかもしれない。だが、あなたは違う。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}あなたはもっとひどい目にあってきた{/d}。苦悩や拷問は、今のあなたを決して壊すことはできない。あなたは立ち上がり、前進する。あとは、なぜそうしなければならないかを理解するだけだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your body has suffered too much to obey your mind... or rather, that is how it would have been for someone else, perhaps. But not for you. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}You have lived through worse{/d}. Anguish and torture could never break you now. You will rise to your feet and press on. All that is left to understand is why you should.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの体は、あなたの心に従えないほどの苦しみの中にある…というより、他の誰かにとってはそういった状態なのかもしれない。だが、あなたは違う。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}あなたはもっとひどい目にあってきた{/d}。苦悩や拷問は、今のあなたを決して壊すことはできない。あなたは立ち上がり、前進する。あとは、なぜそうしなければならないかを理解するだけだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bedenin o kadar kötü durumda ki emirlerine itaat etmek istemiyor. Daha doğrusu, başka biri olsaydı muhtemelen itaat etmezdi ama bu, senin için geçerli değil. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Sen çok daha kötülerine maruz kaldın{/d}. Acı ve işkence seni alt edemez. Ayağa kalkacak, yol alacaksın. Anlamadığın tek şeyse bunu neden yapman gerektiği.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your body has suffered too much to obey your mind... or rather, that is how it would have been for someone else, perhaps. But not for you. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}You have lived through worse{/d}. Anguish and torture could never break you now. You will rise to your feet and press on. All that is left to understand is why you should.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bedenin o kadar kötü durumda ki emirlerine itaat etmiyor. Daha doğrusu, başka biri olsaydı muhtemelen öyle olurdu. Bu, senin için geçerli değil. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Sen çok daha kötülerine maruz kaldın{/d}. Acı ve işkence seni alt edemez. Ayağa kalkacaksın ve yoluna devam edeceksin. Anlamadığın tek şey, bunu neden yapman gerektiği.{/n}
